programme.title: Ground Swell: Epic Stories of Monster Waves
programme.desc: Showcasing the most famous big wave spots on the planet and the surfers who tackled them.

programme.title: Paradigm Lost
programme.desc: Filmed over three years, in six countries, Paradigm Lost captures the highest level of water sports action in beautiful 4K. In between the action are heartfelt stories of the characters at the top of their sports.

programme.title: Nervous Laughter
programme.desc: Nervous Laughter follows Maui's best surfers as they take on the island's giant wave, Jaws, and shatter expectations of what's possible in big wave surfing.

programme.title: Tokyo Rising
programme.desc: John John Florence puts his career on the line against Kelly Slater to qualify for surfings debut in the 2020 Olympics.

programme.title: View from a Blue Moon
programme.desc: See the sport of surfing as its never been captured before in John Florence and Blake Vincent Kuenys second signature release, this time in association with the award-winning film studio, Brain Farm.

programme.title: Peel: The Peru Project
programme.desc: Wes Brown and TJ Barrack take their film crew to the rugged deserts and jungles in Peru with some of the world's best surfers.

programme.title: Psychic Migrations
programme.desc: Psychic Migrations is a cerebral surf odyssey through the vivid textures - of the West Indies, East Indies, Australia, Polynesia, Central and South - America.

programme.title: Self Discovery for Social Survival
programme.desc: A Mexican Summer and Pilgrim Surf + Supply film, Self Discovery for Social Survival is an exploration of sound and pro-surf, conjuring a surreal symbiosis of music, the environment and local culture.

programme.title: Discovering Mavericks
programme.desc: This is the story of those who risked their lives, some paying the ultimate price, for the ultimate ride. Executive produced by Mavericks legend Jeff Clark and directed by Joshua Pomer. Winner of the Newport Beach Film Festival 2013 Audience Award.

programme.title: Lost Atlas
programme.desc: Featuring the original six from Mod Coll and introducing surfing's newest guns. With its emphasis on performance and struck to a soundtrack that veers across all genres, Lost Atlas is the must-see surf film of 2011.

programme.title: Havana Libre
programme.desc: After years of surfing being illegal, a diehard group of Cuban surfers fight to legitimize their passion. Havana Libre chronicles their fight in the face of political oppression, confronting borders and outdated ideologies along the way.

programme.title: Kalani: Gift from Heaven
programme.desc: A short documentary film featuring waterman Kalani Lattanzi challenging the boundaries of Big Wave Surfing. Filmed in Nazare and Rio de Janeiro, he faces the biggest waves in the world, in the most pure form of wave riding: bodysurf.

programme.title: Archy: Built for Speed, Born to Ride
programme.desc: Archys story is one of survival through surf stardom at an early age, fame, drugs, alcohol, sponsorships and the surf rock star lifestyle. Compelling interviews, and explosive surf action from the 80s, 90s, 2000s and beyond.

programme.title: The Arena: North Shore
programme.desc: Every winter on the North Shore of Oahu, the best surfers in the world come to charge the infamous Bonzai Pipeline to prove their worthiness. It is on the deadliest wave in the world where young surfer's careers are sprung into superstardom.

programme.title: Ground Swell: Epic Stories of Monster Waves
programme.desc: Showcasing the most famous big wave spots on the planet and the surfers who tackled them.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge follows surfers shaping ice boards, battling nature in a poetic tribute to Lofoten.

programme.title: Ground Swell: Other Side of Fear
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the 2021-22 big wave season through the eyes of legendary surfers.

programme.title: Big Wave Tow-In Invitational
programme.desc: Five of the world's most prolific big wave riders charge 30-foot waves at the center of the big wave universe.

programme.title: And Two If By Sea
programme.desc: The story of iconic professional surfers and identical twins CJ & Damien Hobgood. Their sibling rivalry and struggle to each establish their own identity fueled their careers, but ripped their personal and peripheral relationships apart.

programme.title: Dirty Old Wedge
programme.desc: Dirty Old Wedge is the real life story of the world's most infamous shorebreak and those who live it
